alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:57PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of southeastern Collier, Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade, southeastern Hendry and Broward Counties through 245 PM EST... At 157 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to 7 miles northwest of Big Cypress National Preserve to near Chokoloskee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Weston, Plantation Island, Loop Road Ee Center, Carnestown, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Copeland, Wilderness Waterway, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Big Cypress National Preserve, Fortymile Bend, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Everglades National Park and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Broward County
